Reviews.Title: Best Buy From Amazon Ever
Reviews.Author: Kenji-kun
Reviews.Content: I order this phone because my last one fell in a puddle. It was my first touch phone and my first phone purchase online. I am not in the least bit disappointed. The phone shipped 5 DAYS EARLY!!! I was so happy when it got here. When i opened the box the phone was in perfect condition and it even came with a car charger which i was not expecting. The phone works beautifully and actually exceeded my expectations. I highly HIGHLY recomend this phone and the seller.

Reviews.Title: touch screen very bad
Reviews.Author: fiiifi
Reviews.Content: I got this phone and about 7 months after the touch screen stopped working. Cannot access anything on my phone except receive calls. I returned it and got a replacement. Exactly after another 7 months same problem. This time I am not getting a  replacement. This phone is really really not  good. The touch screen is very bad and stops working after some few months. I am highly disappointed in it.

Reviews.Title: Had this phone for over two years
Reviews.Author: T. M. Childress
Reviews.Content: I got this phone free with a two-year renewal contract with ATT over two years ago--I lost track of time. I absolutely love this phone, more so than even all the iPhones owned by every other member of my family. I'm the hold-out. :o) When this one goes, I will buy another one just like it. Over the years, I have dropped this multiple times on all surfaces, and the glass has never shattered, though there are some minor scratches. The only problem I had for a short period was when it kept turning off at the slightest bump, but that was because of a loose battery (a spare that I had bought). I just cut a thin strip from a jello box, wedged it under the battery, and the problem was solved. I even got it wet because it was on a table where something spilled and ran--but I threw paper towels all around, rescued the phone, opened it up, air-dried everything, checked the contacts, put it back together, and it worked fine. What I love best about it is the texting feature because I've become an expert in typing on this thing with my thumbnails so much that I HATE all other phone keyboards, meaning the ones that have tiny round keys or even the sensitive touch screens like the iPhone, even when using a stylus, like my husband does. I hope that LG never stops making this phone. My husband says I should just buy another one to have in reserve, and I just very well may do that, because I love it. It has served me well, and it is so much a part of me. By now, my phone is scratched, the back is worn, and the screen has little worn marks like little frosty ovals from my thumb nails from texting. Pure character of a very good phone!! It has served me--and is continuing to serve me--well.

Reviews.Title: touch phone
Reviews.Author: Akua
Reviews.Content: When I got this phone it had a problem with the battery but that was fix by the seller. who took care of the problem very fast.  The phone also came fast. I love this phone. It has live TV, a large 3" screen,2 mega-pixel camera,video sharing,stereo Blue tooth, and a memory card slot. what more could you want

Reviews.Title: Didn't last
Reviews.Author: C. Behnke
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone about 2 months ago, and randomly the buttons on the phone stopped working and then about a few hours after, the screen stopped working completely. It was a waste of my money.

Reviews.Title: Sooooo easy to use
Reviews.Author: Lauren Milburn
Reviews.Content: This is an easy phone to use.  It's small and convenient and does what I need without having a smart phone.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: normal
Reviews.Author: Hernany
Reviews.Content: I order this phone because my last one fell in a puddle. It was my first touch phone and my first phone purchase online. I am not in the least bit disappointed. The phone shipped 5 DAYS EARLY!!! I was so happy when it got here. When i opened the box the phone was in perfect condition and it even came with a car charger which i was not expecting. The phone works beautifully and actually exceeded my expectations. I highly HIGHLY recomend this phone and the seller.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the 'Vu'
Reviews.Author: Frog715
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I lost my old one and I really missed having it.  I have my work cell phone for all of the Smart Phone options but I really like this phone for personal use.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy
Reviews.Author: txchick2157
Reviews.Content: I am very unhappy with this phone. It has so many problems! It shuts off whenever it wants and now the  camera just keeps taking pictures and ignores when you touch the screen sometimes!

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Gorumboy
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine & I would order another if needed. I wish could have another color instead of red.

Reviews.Title: i would return
Reviews.Author: clifton morris
Reviews.Content: this is a very good deal for the price i would recommend you to any one to check you out thanks

Reviews.Title: Very nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Asker
Reviews.Content: This is our first touch screen phone, I ordered this phone for my wife and she is very happy because this phone is light in weight, long last battery life and easy to use, long story short "Exceeded our Expectations"

Reviews.Title: Not Fun.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Just because it's a touch screen, do not buy this phone. It was hard to type on with the touch keyboard. Also, it was not as nice as it looks in the picture. The phone was horribly made and I had it for less than a week and it started doing this thing where it would just turn off. It would not come back on for hours at a time. Weird. Just saying, don't buy this phone. Put a little more money towards a decent phone. This one is a waste.

Reviews.Title: NO GOOD
Reviews.Author: yyy
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE IS NO GOOD. TOUCH SCREEN IS NOT WORKING. I TOUCH SCREEN, BUT ALL THE TIME PUSH THE DIFFERENT PLACE. I NEED TO RETURN.
